members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Shows who updated the record on behalf of another user.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who updated the record on behalf of another user.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Badge' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Shows the reason for the status of the badge.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Badge' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Shows the reason for the status of the badge.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Shows the sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Shows the sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was migrated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was migrated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in the solution options.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Shows the time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Shows the time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name

constantValues: Shows the name of the custom entity.

members.description: Shows the name of the custom entity.
